docs.summary:
The wix-site-properties-backend module contains functionality for getting
 [your site's properties](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-your-sites-business-info)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Site Properties API, import `wixSiteProperties` from the `wix-site-properties-backend` module:
